title: Building from Source
para:
Installing from source will involve the following steps: getting the source, resolving dependencies, configuration, compilation, testing, and installation. The &app; installation process is fairly standard:
./autogen.sh ./configure <options> make make check make install
Continue reading for detailed step-by-step instructions of the entire procedure.
Presently, &app; source is about 16 MB when extracted and configured. Compilation requires about 100 MB of harddrive space. A minimum of 128 MB of physical RAM is recommended for compiling.
